title: step_1
exercise: Stand straight with feet hip-width apart
think: Make sure your feet apart, slightly wider than your hips

title: step_2
think: Standing up tall, gently pull your shoulders back, subtly lift your chest

title: step_3
exercise: Lower down, as if sitting in an invisible chair
think: Keep your upper body as straight as possible, as if you were lowering yourself onto a seat behind you

title: step_4
exercise: Straighten your legs to lift back up
think: Heels glued to the floor as you squat, and then think about driving them into the ground
